author: Joseph Hernandez
title: Dinosaur bones and cocktails: Drink at the Field Museum's pop-up bar this weekend - Chicago Tribune
text:
Dinosaur bones and cocktails: Drink at the Field Museum's pop-up bar this weekend Paul McGee Taylor Castle / Chicago Tribune 
Paul McGee, pictured at the Cherry Circle Room in the Chicago Athletic Associaton Hotel, will create drinks for a pop-up bar at the CAA in collaboration wih the Field Museum. 
Paul McGee, pictured at the Cherry Circle Room in the Chicago Athletic Associaton Hotel, will create drinks for a pop-up bar at the CAA in collaboration wih the Field Museum. (Taylor Castle / Chicago Tribune)
